name: Crouching Staff - Hidden Dev
description:
Battle your way through the work day with the power of browsing! Find a secret ally in your quest to lower work related stress, ultimately vanquish the Dark Lord and find the golden path to a new era.

- Details
Semi idle game, probably leaning more towards a clicker that you can idle in for some progress

Play-time is about 40 minutes

Does not have a save system

Possibly mildly funny
